items.title: Blender Workshop Part 2 Recording
items.content_text: UTCG Blender Violin Workshop Part 2Here’s the recording for Part 2 of UTCG’s Blender Workshop on October 29, 2021.If the video doesn’t work you can download it.You can also download the Blender file that we started with in the workshop!(You also might want this violin reference image, put it in the same folder as the .blend file)Here’s a finished render.
items.content_html:
UTCG Blender Violin Workshop Part 2

Here’s the recording for Part 2 of UTCG’s Blender Workshop on October 29, 2021.

If the video doesn’t work you can download it.

You can also download the Blender file that we started with in the workshop!(You also might want this violin reference image, put it in the same folder as the .blend file)

Here’s a finished render.

items.title: Blender Workshop Recording
items.content_text: UTCG Blender Violin WorkshopHere’s the recording for Part 1 of UTCG’s Blender Workshop on October 22, 2021.If the video doesn’t work you can download it.You can also download the Blender file that was used in the workshop!(You also might want this violin reference image, put it in the same folder as the .blend file)
items.content_html:
UTCG Blender Violin Workshop

Here’s the recording for Part 1 of UTCG’s Blender Workshop on October 22, 2021.

If the video doesn’t work you can download it.

You can also download the Blender file that was used in the workshop!(You also might want this violin reference image, put it in the same folder as the .blend file)
